It's week 7 of the #NFL season, so let's check in on my model's latest forecast

That's it for our tangent - onto the weekly predictions. Biggest surprise of the week?  @49ers over the @Chiefs at home by 1.  I probably wouldn't bet on it...

As always, I welcome questions and comments
